input: I want degrees to cancel. It's kind of like if I want to get rid of x, well I have to divide by x. In this case I have degrees, so I want to divide by degrees. But if I'm multiplying this in, I've got to make sure it's pi radians on top.
offline_reference: 我想消去度数，这有点像如果我想去掉x，就得除以x；这里我有度数，所以想除以度数，但既然我在进行乘法运算，就必须确保分子是π弧度。
